patch 8.2.1941: Ex mode test fails on MS-Windows with GUI

Problem:    Ex mode test fails on MS-Windows with GUI.
Solution:   Skip the test when using gvim.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1941: Ex mode test fails on MS-Windows with GUI · vim/vim@399db04
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1941: Ex mode test fails on MS-Windows with GUI · vim/vim@399db04
attachments.text: Problem: Ex mode test fails on MS-Windows with GUI. Solution: Skip the test when using gvim.

patch 8.2.1940: Vim9: browse modifier test fails on Mac

Problem:    Vim9: browse modifier test fails on Mac.
Solution:   Only test when the +browse feature is available.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1940: Vim9: browse modifier test fails on Mac · vim/vim@97a1900
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1940: Vim9: browse modifier test fails on Mac · vim/vim@97a1900
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: browse modifier test fails on Mac. Solution: Only test when the +browse feature is available.

patch 8.2.1939: invalid memory access in Ex mode with global command

Problem:    Invalid memory access in Ex mode with global command.
Solution:   Make sure the cursor is on a valid line. (closes #7238)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1939: invalid memory access in Ex mode with global command · vim/vim@3b6d57f
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1939: invalid memory access in Ex mode with global command · vim/vim@3b6d57f
attachments.text: Problem: Invalid memory access in Ex mode with global command. Solution: Make sure the cursor is on a valid line. (closes #7238)

patch 8.2.1938: wiping out a terminal buffer makes some tests fail

Problem:    Wiping out a terminal buffer makes some tests fail.
Solution:   Do not wipe out the terminal buffer unless wanted.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1938: wiping out a terminal buffer makes some tests fail · vim/vim@a46765a
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1938: wiping out a terminal buffer makes some tests fail · vim/vim@a46765a
attachments.text: Problem: Wiping out a terminal buffer makes some tests fail. Solution: Do not wipe out the terminal buffer unless wanted.

patch 8.2.1936: session sets the local 'scrolloff' value to the global value

Problem:    Session sets the local 'scrolloff' value to the global value.
Solution:   Do not let restoring the global option value change the local
            value.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1936: session sets the local 'scrolloff' value to the globa… · vim/vim@3889083
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1936: session sets the local 'scrolloff' value to the globa… · vim/vim@3889083
attachments.text: …l value Problem: Session sets the local 'scrolloff' value to the global value. Solution: Do not let restoring the global option value change the local value.

patch 8.2.1935: sort test fails on Mac

Problem:    Sort test fails on Mac.
Solution:   Disable the sort test with locale on Mac.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1935: sort test fails on Mac · vim/vim@578f4cc
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1935: sort test fails on Mac · vim/vim@578f4cc
attachments.text: Problem: Sort test fails on Mac. Solution: Disable the sort test with locale on Mac.
